56676.en:
<voice 00010_00056676><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Ciao! Welcome to Grandpa Bajeo's
house!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56676.ja:
<voice 00010_00056676><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「チャオー！
　バジェオじいさんの家へ　ようこそー！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56676.ko:
<voice 00010_00056676><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 차오~!
　바제오 할아버지 집에 잘 왔다~!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56676.zh-Hans:
<voice 00010_00056676><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>你好！
欢迎来到巴杰欧爷爷的家！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56676.zh-Hant:
<voice 00010_00056676><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>你好！
歡迎來到巴傑歐爺爺的家！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56677.en:
<voice 00077_00056677><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>You don't look familiar. Did you come
to offer me a job because of my skill
as an engineer?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56677.ja:
<voice 00077_00056677><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「……って　お前さん　見ない顔じゃな。
　もしや　わしの技師としてのウデを見込んで
　仕事の依頼にでも来たんか？<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56677.ko:
<voice 00077_00056677><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: ……응? 넌 처음 보는 얼굴이로구나.
　혹시 내 실력을 믿고
　작업 의뢰라도 맡기러 온 거냐?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56677.zh-Hans:
<voice 00077_00056677><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>……我没有见过你啊。
难道你是看上了我的技术，
有工作要委托给我吗？<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56677.zh-Hant:
<voice 00077_00056677><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>……之前好像沒看過你吧？
你難道是看中我身為技師的手藝，
來委託工作的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56678.en:
<voice 00107_00056678><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>But alas! I'm a retired engineer and
I'm enjoying my retirement! If you
want to talk about work, no thanks.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56678.ja:
<voice 00107_00056678><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「じゃが　残念ー！　ワシは技師を辞めて
　隠居生活を　満喫チューなのじゃ！
　仕事の話なら　ノーセンキューじゃぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56678.ko:
<voice 00107_00056678><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 하지만 안됐구나! 난 기술자는 때려치우고
　은거 생활을 만끽하는 중이거든!
　작업 의뢰는 노 땡큐다.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56678.zh-Hans:
<voice 00107_00056678><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>但是很遗憾！我已经不当技师，
开始享受隐居生活了！如果你是有工作
想委托给我，我只能拒绝你。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56678.zh-Hant:
<voice 00107_00056678><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>可惜！我已經不當技師了，
開始過悠閒的隱居生活！
要談工作我就敬謝不敏了。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56679.en:
<voice 00152_00056679><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>What? You came here on Captain Abram's
business, didn't you?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56679.ja:
<voice 00152_00056679><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「……な　なにっ？　お前さん
　エイブラム船長の使いで来たじゃとっ！？<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56679.ko:
<voice 00152_00056679><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: ……뭐, 뭐라?
　에이브럼 선장의 의뢰로 온 거라고!?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56679.zh-Hans:
<voice 00152_00056679><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>……什、什么？你是
埃布拉姆船长派来的？！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56679.zh-Hant:
<voice 00152_00056679><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>什……什麼？是埃布拉姆船長
派你來的！？<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56680.en:
<voice 00182_00056680><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>I don't know anything about Abram! I
don't know Abram! If I say I don't
know, I don't know!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56680.ja:
<voice 00182_00056680><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「ふ…ふんっ！　エイブラムなんて　知らんもん！
　知らんって言ったら　知らんもん！！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56680.ko:
<voice 00182_00056680><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 흐… 흥! 난 에이브럼 같은 놈은 모른다!
　모른다면 모르는 줄 알아!!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56680.zh-Hans:
<voice 00182_00056680><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>哼……哼！我不认识什么叫埃布拉姆的！
我说不认识就是不认识！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56680.zh-Hant:
<voice 00182_00056680><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>哼……哼！我才不認識什麼埃布拉姆！
我說不認識就是不認識！！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56681.en:
Would you give Bajeo the Engineer's
Toolbag?<yesno><close>
56681.ja:
バジェオに
技師の工具かばんを　渡しますか？<yesno><close>
56681.zh-Hans:
要把技师工具包交给
巴杰欧吗？<yesno><close>
56681.zh-Hant:
是否要將技師工具包
交給巴傑歐？<yesno><close>

56682.en:
<voice 00581_00056682><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>I don't know Abram anymore! If I say I
don't know him, I don't know him!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56682.ja:
<voice 00581_00056682><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「もう　エイブラムなんて　知らんもん！
　知らんって言ったら　知らんもん！！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56682.ko:
<voice 00581_00056682><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 이제 에이브럼 같은 놈은 내 알 바 아니다!
　모른다면 모르는 줄 알아!!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56682.zh-Hans:
<voice 00581_00056682><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>我不认识什么叫埃布拉姆的！
我说不认识就是不认识！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56682.zh-Hant:
<voice 00581_00056682><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>我才不認識什麼埃布拉姆！
我說不認識就是不認識！！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56683.ja:
<pc>は
技師の工具かばんを　取りだした！

56684.en:
<voice 00384_00056684><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>These are my tools of the trade! And
what's this? A High-Tech Wrench in
place of a broken wrench?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56684.ja:
<voice 00384_00056684><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「これは……　ワシの仕事道具……！
　しかも　なんじゃ？　壊れたスパナの代わりに
　ハイテクスパナが　入っておる……？<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56684.ko:
<voice 00384_00056684><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 이건…… 내 작업용 공구 아니냐……!
　게다가 뭐야? 망가진 스패너 대신에
　하이테크 스패너가 들어 있잖아……?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56684.zh-Hans:
<voice 00384_00056684><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>这个是……我工作用的工具！
而且，这是怎么回事？坏掉的扳手
换成了高科技扳手？<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56684.zh-Hant:
<voice 00384_00056684><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>這是……我的工作道具……！
而且這個是……代替壞掉的扳手，
放入了高科技扳手……？<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56685.en:
<voice 00414_00056685><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Damn! Damn you, Abram! Why did you
replace my beloved wrench? Why did you
replace my beloved wrench?<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56685.ja:
<voice 00414_00056685><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「くっ！　エイブラムめ！　なんで
　ワシの愛用のスパナを　取り替えたんじゃ！？
　こ…こんな　ハイテクなぞにしおって！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56685.ko:
<voice 00414_00056685><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 큭! 에이브럼 그 자식!
　왜 내가 애용하던 스패너를 바꾼 게야!?
　게… 게다가 이딴 하이테크 스패너로!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56685.zh-Hans:
<voice 00414_00056685><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>唔！可恶的埃布拉姆！
为什么换掉我惯用的扳手？！
还……还换成这种高科技的玩意！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56685.zh-Hant:
<voice 00414_00056685><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>唔！可惡的埃布拉姆！為什麼把
我愛用的扳手換掉了！？
還……還換成什麼高科技的東西！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56686.en:
<voice 00444_00056686><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>How attached I was to that wrench! I
used to fix it when it broke, loving
its old-fashioned goodness!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56686.ja:
<voice 00444_00056686><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「ワシが　あのスパナに
　どれほどの愛着を持っていたか！　壊れたら直し
　古さならではの良さを愛して　使っていたのに！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56686.ko:
<voice 00444_00056686><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 내가 그 스패너에 얼마나 애착을
　갖고 있었는데! 망가지면 고쳐 쓰면서
　그 손때 묻은 스패너를 애지중지했건만!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56686.zh-Hans:
<voice 00444_00056686><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>我可是很喜欢那个扳手的！
只要坏了我就把它修好，
我就是觉得旧东西有它的好才一直用到现在的啊！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56686.zh-Hant:
<voice 00444_00056686><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>他知道我有多寶貝
那支扳手嗎？只要壞了就修，
我就是覺得老東西有它的好才一直沒換的！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56687.en: <voice 00476_00056687><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>What a selfish bastard!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56687.ja: <voice 00476_00056687><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「まったく　勝手なことをしやが……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56687.ko: <voice 00476_00056687><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 왜 자기 맘대로 하는……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56687.zh-Hans: <voice 00476_00056687><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>真是的，竟然自作主张……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56687.zh-Hant: <voice 00476_00056687><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>受不了，真愛多管閒事……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56690.en:
<voice 00701_00056690><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Don't do anything selfish. Come to
think of it, he said the same thing
when we had a fight.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56690.ja:
<voice 00701_00056690><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「勝手なことをするな……か。
　そう言えば　アイツも　ケンカした時
　同じこと言ってたなあ……。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56690.ko:
<voice 00701_00056690><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 맘대로 하지 마라…….
　그러고 보니 싸웠을 때
　그 녀석도 똑같은 소리를 했었지…….<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56690.zh-Hans:
<voice 00701_00056690><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>不要自作主张吗……
这么说起来，和那家伙吵架的时候，
他也说过同样的话……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56690.zh-Hant:
<voice 00701_00056690><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>愛多管閒事……嗎？
說起來，和他吵架的時候，
他也說了同一句話……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56691.en: <voice 00731_00056691><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>I see. So this is how he felt.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56691.ja:
<voice 00731_00056691><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「……そうか。
　アイツは　こんな気持ちじゃったのか。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56691.ko:
<voice 00731_00056691><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: ……그렇군.
　그 녀석도 이런 기분이었던 건가.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56691.zh-Hans:
<voice 00731_00056691><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>……这样啊。
那家伙那时也是这种心情啊。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56691.zh-Hant:
<voice 00731_00056691><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>……這樣啊，
他當時是這樣的心情啊。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56692.ja: <voice 00791_00056692><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「ぶひゃひゃひゃひゃひゃ！！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56692.zh-Hans: <voice 00791_00056692><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>哈哈哈哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56692.zh-Hant: <voice 00791_00056692><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>噗哈哈哈哈哈！！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56693.en:
<voice 00821_00056693><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Abram...! Okay, okay! I'm sorry, too!
It was me who did it in the first
place!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56693.ja:
<voice 00821_00056693><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「エイブラムめ　こしゃくなマネを！
　オーケー　オーケー！　ワシも　悪かったわ！
　そもそも先にやっちゃったのは　ワシじゃしな！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56693.ko:
<voice 00821_00056693><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 에이브럼 녀석, 잔머리 좀 썼군!
　오케이, 오케이! 나도 잘못했다!
　애초에 먼저 시작한 건 나였으니까!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56693.zh-Hans:
<voice 00821_00056693><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>埃布拉姆那家伙，做这种自以为是的事！
好，好！我也有不对的地方！
说起来最先搞砸的就是我呢！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56693.zh-Hant:
<voice 00821_00056693><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>埃布拉姆你這老不休，耍這種小伎倆！
好、好！我也有錯！
再說先搞砸的也是我嘛！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56694.en:
That's right. I screwed up the power unit at the heart of the Grand Titus, which Abram loves more than anything
else.
56694.ja:
<voice 00911_00056694><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「そう……。ワシは　あのエイブラムが
　何より愛する　グランドタイタス号の心臓部
　……動力装置に　やらかしちゃったんじゃよ。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56694.ko:
<voice 00911_00056694><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 그래……. 난 에이브럼이 그 무엇보다
　사랑하는 그랜드 타이터스호의 심장,
　동력 장치를 건드렸거든.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56694.zh-Hans:
<voice 00911_00056694><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>对……我动了那个埃布拉姆最爱的
大巨人号的核心部分……
也就是动力装置。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56694.zh-Hant:
<voice 00911_00056694><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>沒錯……我弄壞了埃布拉姆最寶貝的
大巨人號的心臟……
也就是動力裝置。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56695.en:
When it came time for repairs, I did him a favor by developing and installing a state-of-the-art
powerplant that would allow the ship to withstand magical mist storms.
56695.ja:
<voice 00941_00056695><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「修理の時……　ワシは　ヤツのためを思い
　あの船が　迷いの霧の嵐にも耐えられるよう
　最新の動力装置を開発して　載せてやった。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56695.ko:
<voice 00941_00056695><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 배를 수리하면서 그 녀석을 생각해
　그 배가 미혹의 안개의 폭풍을 견딜 수 있도록
　최신 동력 장치를 개발해서 장착해 줬지.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56695.zh-Hans:
<voice 00941_00056695><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>修理的时候……我觉得自己是为他着想。
为了让船能经受住迷失之雾的暴风雨，
我开发了最新的动力装置，安在了船上。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56695.zh-Hant:
<voice 00941_00056695><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>修理的時候……我為那傢伙著想，
在那艘船加上最新開發的動力裝置，
使船能夠承受迷途之霧的暴風雨。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56696.en:
And yet, he was angry that I had taken the liberty of turning the ship's most important feature, its rugged and
tasteful power unit, into a high-tech device!
56696.ja:
<voice 00981_00056696><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「なのに　アイツときたら　船の最大の
　ミリョクである　武骨で味わいのある動力装置を
　勝手に　ハイテクにしたって　怒ったんじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56696.ko:
<voice 00981_00056696><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 그런데 그 녀석은 배의 가장 큰 매력인
　투박하고 멋스러운 동력 장치를
　왜 맘대로 하이테크로 바꾸냐며 화내지 뭐냐!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56696.zh-Hans:
<voice 00981_00056696><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>但是那家伙非常生气。他说船最大的魅力就在于
动力装置，而我居然自作主张把原本那个
又狂野又有味道的动力装置换成了高科技的玩意。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56696.zh-Hant:
<voice 00981_00056696><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>可那傢伙卻說我竟然把船最具魅力的
又老又笨的動力裝置，
擅自換成了什麼高科技而發火！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56697.en:
I was so angry at him that I left my tool bag behind and got off the ship! I was so angry that I left my tool bag
behind and got off the ship.
56697.ja:
<voice 01011_00056697><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「あんときは　なんて了見のせまいヤツじゃ！　と
　怒りにまかせ　工具かばんをほっぽり出して
　つい　船を下りてしまったが……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56697.ko:
<voice 01011_00056697><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 그때는 뭐 이런 꽉 막힌 놈이 다 있나 싶어서
　홧김에 공구 가방을 내버려둔 채
　배에서 내렸다만……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56697.zh-Hans:
<voice 01011_00056697><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>我当时觉得他真是一个心胸狭窄的家伙！
因此一时气愤，丢下工具包就下了船……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56697.zh-Hant:
<voice 01011_00056697><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>我那時覺得他真是個心胸狹窄的傢伙！
一氣之下就把工具包甩給他，
下船去了……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56698.en:
I understood it when he did the same thing to me. I also learned that what you do for the best of your intentions
may offend the other person.
56698.ja:
<voice 01076_00056698><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「同じことをされて　ワシもわかった。
　よかれと思ってやったことが
　相手を怒らせることも　あるんじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56698.ko:
<voice 01076_00056698><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 똑같은 일을 당해 보니 이제야 알겠어.
　상대를 위해 한 일이
　상대를 화나게 만드는 경우도 있는 거로군.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56698.zh-Hans:
<voice 01076_00056698><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>现在他对我做了同样的事，我也懂了。
即使自己觉得好的事，
也可能会让对方生气。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56698.zh-Hant:
<voice 01076_00056698><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>但受到同樣的對待後，我也懂了。
自己覺得好的事，
也許會惹怒對方。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56699.en:
<voice 01118_00056699><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Well, now we're even! I guess the bag
was Abram's way of telling you to keep
working as a clocksmith.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56699.ja:
<voice 01118_00056699><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「まあ　これで　おあいこじゃ！
　かばんを届けてくれたのは　技師を続けろという
　エイブラムなりの　メッセージじゃろうよ。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56699.ko:
<voice 01118_00056699><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이걸로 비긴 셈이지!
　가방을 전해 준 건 기술자를 그만두지 말라는
　에이브럼의 메시지일 게다.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56699.zh-Hans:
<voice 01118_00056699><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>算了，这下就扯平了！
让你把包送还给我，这是埃布拉姆
用他的方式告诉我要继续当技师。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56699.zh-Hant:
<voice 01118_00056699><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>不過，這樣就扯平了！
把工具包送還給我，這是埃布拉姆用他的方式
告訴我要繼續當技師。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56700.en:
Well, first of all, I'm going to start with this Engineer's Toolbag to get rid of all the work I've accumulated.
Hmm? Speaking of which...
56700.ja:
<voice 01188_00056700><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「さて……まずは　この　技師の工具かばんで
　たまった仕事を片付けることから　始めるかの。
　む？　そういえば……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56700.ko:
<voice 01188_00056700><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 그럼…… 우선 이 기술자의 공구 가방으로
　그간 밀린 작업부터 처리해 볼까.
　응? 그러고 보니……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56700.zh-Hans:
<voice 01188_00056700><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>好了……先用这技师工具包
把积攒的工作解决掉再说吧。
嗯？这么说来……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56700.zh-Hant:
<voice 01188_00056700><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>那麼……先用這個技師工具包
解決掉累積的工作再說吧。
嗯？說起來……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56701.en:
It's about time for the Gran Zedora Castle device. Oops! Sorry, I was talking about this side. Well then,
give my regards to Abram!
56701.ja:
<voice 01218_00056701><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「グランゼドーラ城の例の装置も　そろそろ……。
　おっと！　すまん　こっちの話じゃ。
　んでは　エイブラムに　よろしくのう！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56701.ko:
<voice 01218_00056701><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 그랑제도라성의 그 장치도 이제 슬슬…….
　어이쿠! 미안, 너희와는 상관없는 얘기다.
　그럼 에이브럼에게 안부 전해다오!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56701.zh-Hans:
<voice 01218_00056701><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>古兰泽朵拉城的那个装置也差不多……
啊！不好意思，我在自言自语。
替我告诉埃布拉姆，今后也请他多关照！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56701.zh-Hant:
<voice 01218_00056701><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>古蘭澤朵拉城那個裝置也該……
哎呀！抱歉，我在自言自語。
那麼，代我向埃布拉姆打聲招呼！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56702.en:
<voice 00010_00056702><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Ciao! Welcome to the home of the
genius engineer Bajeo!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56702.ja:
<voice 00010_00056702><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「チャオー！
　天才技師バジェオの家に　ようこそー！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56702.ko:
<voice 00010_00056702><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 차오~!
　천재 기술자 바제오의 집에 잘 왔다~!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56702.zh-Hans:
<voice 00010_00056702><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>你好！
欢迎来到天才技师巴杰欧的家！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56702.zh-Hant:
<voice 00010_00056702><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>你好！
歡迎來到天才技師巴傑歐的家！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56703.en:
<voice 00077_00056703><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Oh, it's you, isn't it? You're the one
who took care of me the other day.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56703.ja:
<voice 00077_00056703><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「……っと　お前さんか。
　いつぞやは　世話になったのう。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56703.ko:
<voice 00077_00056703><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: ……뭐야? 너였구먼.
　일전에는 신세가 많았다.<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56703.zh-Hans:
<voice 00077_00056703><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>……是你啊。
上次真是麻烦你了。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56703.zh-Hant:
<voice 00077_00056703><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>……是你啊，
之前受你照顧了。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56704.en:
Abram, as usual, was not so straightforward, and went to the trouble of replacing the spanner and
delivering it to me, which was a bit of a roundabout way of getting around.
56704.ja:
<voice 00107_00056704><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「エイブラムのヤツは　相変わらず素直じゃなくて
　わざわざ　スパナを交換して　届けるなんて
　回りくどいことをしてくれやがったが……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56704.ko:
<voice 00107_00056704><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 에이브럼 녀석, 여전히 배배 꼬여서
　굳이 스패너를 바꿔서 전해 주는
　귀찮은 일을 벌였다만……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56704.zh-Hans:
<voice 00107_00056704><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>埃布拉姆那家伙还是那么不坦率。
居然特意把扳手换掉之后把包给我送来，
要表达自己的想法也兜这么大一个圈子……<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56704.zh-Hant:
<voice 00107_00056704><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>埃布拉姆那傢伙還是那麼不老實，
居然特地換掉我的扳手讓你送過來，
要表達自己的想法還兜這麼大一圈……
<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56705.en:
<voice 00147_00056705><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>I'm glad I got my tools back, to be
honest. The equipment at Gran Zedora
Castle was in need of maintenance!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56705.ja:
<voice 00147_00056705><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「工具が戻ってきて　正直　助かった。
　グランゼドーラ城の　あの装置も　そろそろ
　メンテナンスが必要な頃じゃったしな！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56705.ko:
<voice 00147_00056705><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 공구가 돌아와서 솔직히 한시름 놨다.
　그랑제도라성의 그 장치도 이제 슬슬
　점검이 필요할 때니까!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56705.zh-Hans:
<voice 00147_00056705><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>说实话，你把工具送回来真是帮了我大忙。
古兰泽朵拉城的那个装置
也差不多该做维护了。<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56705.zh-Hant:
<voice 00147_00056705><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>不過拿回了工具，真是幫了我大忙。
古蘭澤朵拉城的那個裝置
也差不多該維修了！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56706.en:
<voice 00179_00056706><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>Perfectly good timing! Well then, give
my regards to Abram!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56706.ja:
<voice 00179_00056706><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>「さすがは　エイブラム！
　バッチリ　グッドな　タイミングじゃったぞい！
　……んでは　エイブラムに　よろしくのう！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56706.ko:
<voice 00179_00056706><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>: 역시 에이브럼이야!
　아주 굿 타이밍이었어!
　……그럼 에이브럼에게 안부 전해다오!<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56706.zh-Hans:
<voice 00179_00056706><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>不愧是埃布拉姆！
时机掌握得刚刚好！
……替我告诉埃布拉姆，今后也请他多关照！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56706.zh-Hant:
<voice 00179_00056706><start_lip_sync n02231 _normal m00001>真不愧是埃布拉姆！
真是挑對了好時機！
那麼，代我向埃布拉姆打聲招呼！<stop_lip_animation n02231 CLOSE_MOUTH>
